question: Turning on Notebooks
answer: ï»¿Before you can set up a notebook in ArcGIS Online, you need to make sure they are enabled on your server. See here for directions.

question: How do I share my map?
answer: Click the Share button in the top-right corner and choose your sharing options.

question: Can I embed a map into a website?
answer: Yes, click the Share button and use the provided embed code to add your map to any website.
